# VEHICLE::GET_VEHICLE_MODEL_MAX_BRAKING

## Summary
Get the maximum braking force this vehicle model can apply, may not be accurate due to tyres slipping

## Parameters
* **MODEL_NAMES** vehicleModelHashKey: VehicleModelName - model name of vehicle

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns max braking of the specified vehicle model.

Full list of vehicles by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/vehicles.json
